lines: Ndeumfwa shiwi lileti, 'Sa unkonke lyonse, unkonke.
Nakula sendo lupanda, no kukonko Mupusushi;
Uko konse ntungulula, Ku mukonka konse fye.
2. Nangu nshila yafitisha, Makasa nayo yanaka;
Lelo umutima wandi wena kumukonka lyonse.
3. Yes' ali kuntanshi yandi, Lubuto munshila yandi;
Nga nanaka alampa amaka, Nakulamukonka lyonse.
4. Mu mikonko alansunga, lyonse alampelo kulya;
5. Walintemwa Mfumu yandi, Nsungwe mumaboko yenu;
